DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify whether sleep-disordered breathe - measure overnight polysomnography - associate pre-eclampsia determine whether use positive airway pressure improve nocturnal blood pressure .

DOC.criteria: Women preeclampsia receive care University Michigan Hospitals Aged least 14 year old . No current use PAP therapy . Willing able provide inform consent . Current PAP therapy Any medical reason PAP therapy may suitable ( e.g. , patient recent head trauma ) . Cognitively impaired unable understand inform consent .
